name: Etumobil Mobile Application
shortDescription: Etumobil is a feature-rich mobile application designed for TOBB ETU students, offering seamless access to essential academic resources and tools. With its user-friendly interface and advanced data integration capabilities, Etumobil simplifies academic management, enabling students to effortlessly navigate schedules, track GPA, access course information, and communicate efficiently with faculty and peers.
description:
Etumobil is a mobile app made for TOBB ETU students, using Svelte Kit and Capacitor Js. It's meant to help students with their academics, providing features for easy navigation and convenience. The app has a simple interface, making it easy for students to access and organize important information like lesson schedules, course details, GPA tracking, and communication tools.

Etumobil uses a strong data fetching system to gather accurate and timely data from TOBB ETU web sources, ensuring students have the latest and reliable information for their academic needs. The app is designed to simplify academic tasks, making student life more straightforward and productive. It aims to be a helpful tool for TOBB ETU students, leveraging modern technologies to enhance the overall academic experience.

name: ADS-B Flight Map
shortDescription: The ADS-B Flight Map is a web-based application developed using Svelte Kit, offering real-time tracking of aircraft using ADS-B data. With its intuitive interface and comprehensive features, including flight path visualization, aircraft details, and map customization, the application provides an immersive and informative experience for aviation enthusiasts and learners.
description: adsb-flight-map stands as an advanced real-time aircraft tracking application, utilizing server-fetched data to dynamically render the positions of aircraft on an interactive 3D map. This application caters to users by allowing them to actively engage with the map, providing real-time insights into the positions and details of all aircraft within the camera's scope. Notable features include the ability to seamlessly select specific aircraft from either the map or a detailed table, offering a wealth of information, including ICAO address, flight identification, aircraft type, transponder code, and more. The interactive 3D map permits users to zoom, rotate, tilt, and pan, enabling exploration of diverse regions and perspectives. Additionally, a robust search functionality allows users to filter aircraft based on various criteria, ensuring a tailored and efficient data view in the accompanying table. The application also facilitates sorting of every column in the table, providing users with the flexibility to organize data based on their preferences. adsb-flight-map emerges as a valuable tool for aviation enthusiasts and professionals alike, offering a comprehensive and dynamic platform for tracking and exploring real-time aircraft data.

name: MarkMate Web Application
shortDescription: MarkMate.io is a user-friendly online markdown editor built with Svelte Kit, offering real-time preview, customizable themes, and multi-platform compatibility. With extensive markdown support, including math expressions and code blocks, it simplifies content creation. Its seamless cloud integration make it a powerful tool for efficient writing.
description: MarkMate.io is a online markdown web application developed using Svelte Kit, offering intuitive platform for users to create and edit content with a comprehensive suite of features. Boasting interface, live preview functionality, and multi-platform compatibility, MarkMate.io suits for writers, developers, and content creators. With a focus on user customization, it provides a range of themes, editing modes, and typographic enhancements. MarkMate.io supports complex markdown elements, including math expressions and code blocks, along with syntax highlighting, ensuring adaptable environment for a range of writing styles. Its integration with popular cloud storage services facilitates document management. As MarkMate.io continues to evolve, it aims to introduce advanced syntax highlighting options, and improved cloud integration capabilities.

name: Simon FPGA Game
shortDescription: The Simon Game is a classic memory game that challenges players to replicate increasingly complex sequences of lights. The Simon Game FPGA project for Basys3 faithfully recreates this experience, integrating smooth transitions, reliable button input, and informative 7-segment display feedback, all within a collaborative open-source development environment.
description: The Simon Game FPGA project, developed for the Basys3 FPGA development board, is a recreation of the classic memory and cognitive skill-testing game. The game involves generating random sequences of lights and sounds displayed on LEDs, which players must memorize and replicate using the corresponding buttons. With a sophisticated state machine ensuring smooth gameplay transitions, the project uses button debouncing for reliable player input. The 7-segment displays serve to show player's score and highest step reached. Created by a dedicated team of developers, including Oruç Çakır, Osman Cesur, and Ömer İlbilgi.

name: Snake Ai Game
shortDescription: Snake-AI is a 2D game developed using Svelte Kit, delivering an immersive classic snake gameplay experience. It employs an optimized doubly linked list algorithm, ensuring seamless and responsive gameplay as the snake grows. The upcoming version will introduce an AI feature, enhanced graphics, and sound effects, alongside plans for leaderboard integration.
description:
Snake-AI is a 2D game crafted with the Svelte Kit, featuring a design that caters to users on both desktop and mobile devices. The game is notable for its use of a finely-tuned doubly linked list algorithm, ensuring the effective handling of the snake's movements and body.

In its current iteration, Snake-AI centers around manual user control, but an upcoming version is set to introduce an advanced AI feature for autonomous gameplay. This update will coincide with a significant revamp in graphics and audio effects, enhancing the overall gaming experience.

Looking ahead, the roadmap for future iterations includes exciting plans such as the integration of a leaderboard and achievements system. Additionally, the developers aim to incorporate multiplayer support, adding a social and competitive dimension to the Snake-AI gaming experience.

description:

name: Grovio Music Application
shortDescription: Grovio is a web application that simplifies the process of accessing music from various streaming services. By converting links from different platforms into YouTube music links, Grovio enables seamless music streaming and downloading. With its user-friendly interface, customizable options, and a modern in-app player, Grovio provides a streamlined and enjoyable music experience for users across desktop and mobile platforms.
description: Grovio is a web application developed using Svelte Kit, developed to streamline the process of accessing and enjoying music from various streaming services. It offers users feature of converting links from popular platforms such as Spotify, YouTube Music, Deezer, Apple Music, Tidal, Amazon Music, AudioMack, Qobuz, Napster, and more into YouTube music links. This conversion allows users to effortlessly stream and download their desired music using the YouTube InnerTube API. Grovio also have additional functionalities like the downloading of track metadata and lyrics, customizable user interface options, and a modern in-app music player. The platform's responsive design ensures a consistent and user-friendly experience across desktop and mobile devices.

name: Maze Visualizer
shortDescription: The Maze Visualizer is a user-friendly web tool built with Svelte Kit, enabling the generation and solving of mazes using various algorithms. It offers an interactive interface for users to visualize the maze creation and solution process, catering to both desktop and mobile platforms. With support for a diverse range of algorithms, it provides a seamless and engaging experience for maze enthusiasts and learners alike.
description:
The Maze Visualizer is a web tool made with Svelte Kit for interactive maze generation and solving. Users can explore various algorithms for maze creation and solving, including Recursive Backtracker, Prim's Algorithm, Kruskal's Algorithm, Eller's Algorithm, Wilson's Algorithm, Hunt and Kill Algorithm, Binary Tree Algorithm, Sidewinder Algorithm, Aldous-Broder Algorithm, and Growing Tree Algorithm. It also features maze-solving algorithms like Depth-First Search (DFS), Breadth-First Search (BFS), A* Search, Dijkstra's Algorithm, Wall Follower (Left Hand Rule, Right Hand Rule), Trémaux's Algorithm, Dead-end filling Algorithm, Pledge Algorithm, Flood Fill Algorithm, and Bellman-Ford Algorithm.

The user-friendly interface allows real-time visualization of maze generation and solving processes, promoting better understanding. With a focus on smooth interaction, the Maze Visualizer ensures optimal performance on both desktop and mobile platforms, serving maze enthusiasts, educational institutions, and more.

name: Speed Micro Mouse
shortDescription: The Speed Micro Mouse is a robot designed to navigate a maze autonomously. With its sophisticated design and advanced features, including a 3D-printed chassis, a custom PCB, and a powerful STM32 microcontroller, the Speed Micro Mouse offers a seamless and engaging experience for enthusiasts and learners alike.
description:
The Speed Micro Mouse is an autonomous maze-navigating robot designed to offer an engaging experience for enthusiasts and learners. Featuring advanced components such as a 3D-printed chassis, a custom PCB, and a high-performance STM32 microcontroller, this project is well-suited for those interested in robotics.

The heart of the robot is the STM32F407VG microcontroller, responsible for controlling motors and sensors. The 3D-printed chassis, along with a custom PCB, forms the foundation of the robot's hardware design. Key sensors include an MPU6050 accelerometer and gyroscope, a VL53L0X time-of-flight (ToF) distance sensor, and a QTR-8RC line sensor array.

The Speed Micro Mouse is a collaborative effort led by a team of dedicated students, namely Oruç Çakır, Osman Cesur, and Ömer İlbilgi. The project's objective is to participate in the IEEE Turkey Micro Mouse Competition, showcasing innovation and expertise in the field of robotics.
